name: Epic potions: School of Alchemy
description:
In the Epic Potions: School of Alchemy you will find smart logical approach to brewing multiple potions with natural ingredients.

--Learn to use fire, ladle and gravity to turn elements of ingredients into target potion. --Manipulate layers in the cauldron to succeed.
--Magic book will reward you with new exciting recepies and mechanics.
--Take part in the weekly potion challenge to win different surprises or get a pet to keep you a company!
